statements: SELECT * FROM order_fulfillment;
SELECT customer_id, order_status FROM order_fulfillment WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT product_id, fulfillment_type FROM order_fulfillment WHERE fulfillment_type = 'In-store pickup';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_status FROM order_fulfillment WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM order_fulfillment WHERE order_status = 'Processing' ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM order_fulfillment WHERE order_status = 'pending';
SELECT customer_id, product_id FROM order_fulfillment WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM order_fulfillment WHERE fulfillment_type = 'express' AND product_id = 2001;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, order_status FROM order_fulfillment ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, fulfillment_type FROM order_fulfillment WHERE order_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount, customer_id FROM orders;
SELECT status_id, order_id, status FROM order_status;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 3;
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, os.status FROM orders o JOIN order_status os ON o.order_id = os.order_id WHERE os.status = 'Shipped';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT center_id, center_name, location FROM FulfillmentCenters WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT status_id, order_id, status_date FROM OrderStatus WHERE status_message LIKE '%shipped%';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM OrderStatus WHERE status_message LIKE '%shipped%' ORDER BY status_date;
SELECT center_id, center_name, location FROM FulfillmentCenters WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY center_name ASC;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.total_amount, FulfillmentCenters.location FROM Orders INNER JOIN FulfillmentCenters ON Orders.customer_id = FulfillmentCenters.center_id WHERE Orders.total_amount > 500 ORDER BY Orders.total_amount DESC;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, OrderStatus.status_message FROM Orders LEFT JOIN OrderStatus ON Orders.order_id = OrderStatus.order_id WHERE OrderStatus.status_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY Orders.order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped'
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT order_id, order_status, updated_at FROM order_status_history WHERE DATE(updated_at) = CURDATE()
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, o.order_status, h.status AS `status_history` FROM orders o INNER JOIN order_status_history h ON o.order_id = h.order_id ORDER BY o.order_id DESC, h.updated_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM order_fulfillments;
SELECT order_id, product_id, fulfillment_date FROM order_fulfillments WHERE status = 'shipped';
SELECT name, description, price FROM products WHERE category = 'electronics';
SELECT * FROM order_statuses ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email, address FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM order_fulfillments WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM order_fulfillments WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY fulfillment_date DESC;
SELECT p.product_id, p.name, o.quantity FROM products p JOIN order_fulfillments o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.status = 'Delivered';
SELECT c.full_name, c.email, w.name FROM customers c JOIN warehouses w ON c.address = w.location WHERE c.phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT o.order_id, o.fulfillment_date, s.status FROM order_fulfillments o JOIN order_statuses s ON o.order_id = s.order_id WHERE o.fulfillment_date >= DATE '2021-01-01' ORDER BY s.timestamp ASC;
